business.headline: US stock market opening: Wall Street opens lower as tariff concerns resurfaceDarden Restaurants Inc. was the biggest gainer, climbing by 6.52%, at the opening bell. Others in the green zone included Jabil Inc., up by 4.09%, Solventum Corp., which rose by 2.41% and TransDigm Group Inc., which climbed by 2.15%.

EPFO speeds up claim processing, 60% settled via automated systemTo further quicken the process, EPFO has automated claims related to medical emergencies, housing, studies, and marriage costs. With this system in place, claims are now processed within just three days.

Daughter's future? Which is better- Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana or ELSS?SSY offers 8.2% as an annual interest rate. Investors can invest a minimum of Rs 250, while the maximum limit is Rs 1.5 lakh per year. Further, this scheme allows tax benefits under Sector 80C of the Income Tax Act 1961.

Money after divorce: How courts calculate alimonyAlimony in India does not follow a fixed formula. Courts consider various factors such as the financial position of both spouses, their earning potential, and their contributions to the marriage.

Jio Financial, Allianz likely reach deal for insurance joint venture in India: ReportJio Financial Services has reached an initial deal for a joint venture with Allianz SE to form an insurance business in India.
Sensex ends 900 points higher, Nifty over 23,100; Airtel gains 4%The S&P BSE Sensex jumped 899.01 points to close at 76,348.06, while the NSE Nifty50 added 283.05 points to end at 23,190.65.

Worker regrets moving from Noida to Bengaluru for Rs 30,000 hike. Here's whyIn a recent social media post, a corporate employee described Bengaluru as "dirty, unorganised," with bad roads and the worst traffic. Apart from infrastructure issues, the worker also mentioned feeling a "north vs south" divide in everyday interactions.

Air India in talks to buy more widebody jets from Airbus and Boeing: ReportThe potential order is expected to be worth billions of dollars and could help the airline expand its long-haul fleet as it undergoes a major transformation under Tata Group ownership.

Sensex soars over 900 points: 3 factors behind stock market rallyShare market today: This week has been one of the best for Dalal Street this year. The S&P BSE Sensex surged 818.21 points to 76,267.26, while the NSE Nifty50 jumped 254.50 points to 23,162.10 at 1:33 pm.

Boeing plane delays clip Akasa Air's wings, pilots left waiting: ReportAkasa is among many global airlines affected by Boeing's production issues, which have been worsened by regulatory scrutiny and a workers' strike.

Nithin Kamath's advice to investors amid market volatility : 'Cut your losers'Zerodha's Nithin Kamath shared an essential trading rule that is knowing when to exit a bad trade. Kamath explained that traders often hold on to losing positions, hoping they will recover. But instead of hoping, traders should act with caution and cut their losses early.

IndiGo shares soar after recent update, hit record high. Buy, sell or hold?In just 5 trading sessions, the stock has soared roughly 8%. IndiGo's stock is up over 10% this year and nearly 13% in a month. The latest jump in its share price came after the company recently shared its roadmap for FY30.

entertainment.headline: Kendall Jenner criticizes Khloe Kardashian's 'cold' behavior towards Lamar OdomKendall Jenner criticized Khloe Kardashian's 'cold' and 'snarky' behavior during her reunion with Lamar Odom. She compared it to Khloe's treatment of Tristan Thompson and admitted she cried watching the episode.

Hollywood release shake-up: Warner Bros. reschedules major films for box office successWarner Bros. has rescheduled major releases, pushing The Bride to 2026 and One Battle After Another to September 2025. These moves aim to boost box office earnings and enhance awards season positioning.

Comedian Samay Raina postpones India tour amid India's Got Latent rowComedian Samay Raina shared a note in his Instagram stories, announcing that he has postponed his India tour. His decision comes weeks after he found himself in the middle of a controversy involving podcaster Ranveer Allahabadia's comments on his YouTube show, 'India's Got Latent'.

Lollapalooza 2025 lineup announced: Olivia Rodrigo, A$AP Rocky, and moreLollapalooza 2025's lineup includes Olivia Rodrigo, A$AP Rocky, Sabrina Carpenter, and Korn. The festival runs from July 31 and promises another exciting mix of top artists.

Khloé Kardashian reveals her beauty secretKhloé Kardashian revealed that she uses salmon sperm into her skincare routine. However, experts remain skeptical due to lack of scientific evidence, and the treatment is not FDA-approved.

Sobhita says she drives Naga Chaitanya 'crazy', reveals how they fell in loveActors Sobhita Dhulipala and Naga Chaitanya recently opened up about their sweet bond in a new interview, where they shared how their love story began. The couple got married last December.

Pics: Shaheer Sheikh visits Tirupati temple, reunites with Mahabharat co-starsActor Shaheer Sheikh recently visited the Tirupati temple with his Mahabharat co-stars. The actor donned a traditional outfit and his co-star, Thakur Anup Singh shared the photos.

Kendrick Lamar's label seeks to halt Drake's lawsuit over Not Like Us diss trackUniversal Music Group (UMG) seeks to pause the discovery process in Drake's lawsuit concerning Kendrick Lamar's diss track 'Not Like Us.' Drake's team argues against UMG's delay tactics.

Independent artistes Hanumankind, Diljit Dosanjh take Indian music global: ReportIn addition to Bollywood, independent Indian artistes are gaining significant recognition on the global music stage. Musicians such as Hanumankind, AP Dhillon, Diljit Dosanjh, and others are at the forefront of this movement, drawing a growing international audience.

Armaan and I are one: Singer Amaal Mallik after deleting 'breaking family ties' postSinger Amaal Mallik talked about his struggle with clinical depression in a now-deleted social media post. He announced in the same post that he was breaking ties with his family. However, he later mentioned that his relationship with his brother, Armaan Malik, is fine.

Kanye West accuses Kim Kardashian of 'sex trafficking'Rapper Kanye West ranted against his ex-wife Kim Kardashian in a social media post. He called her a 'sex trafficker' and raised concerns over their daughter, North's music video.

Nepotism in Hollywood vs Bollywood: A tale of talent or just a lucky surname?Nepotism in Bollywood has been a hot topic, especially with the rise of new 'nepo babies' like Ibrahim Ali Khan and Khushi Kapoor. While past generations delivered, the current crop's performances are under scrutiny.
Janhvi Kapoor gets a special gift from Ram Charan's wife Upasana on RC 16 setRam Charan's wife, Upasana Konidela, recently visited the RC 16 set and gave a special gift to Janhvi Kapoor.

Hema Malini's Indian Idol photo raises question again: Are reality shows scripted?Actor-MP Hema Malini's recent appearance on the Indian reality show, Indian Idol, raised questions about the authenticity of such series. We spoke to industry insiders and experts about the same.

Kim Soo-hyun files criminal lawsuit against Sae-ron's family amid controversyActor Kim Soo-hyun's agency has filed criminal lawsuits over a controversial photo shared online by Kim Sae-ron's family. His participation in a Taiwan event is also under review due to the scandal.

Gwyneth Paltrow on filming sex scenes with Timothee Chalamet in Marty SupremeHollywood star Gwyneth Paltrow, who will soon be seen in the film Marty Supreme, with acclaimed actor Timothee Chalamet, reacted to filming intimate scenes with the Oscar-nominated artiste.

Tamannaah says she's 'private about personal life' amid breakup with Vijay VarmaActor Tamannaah Bhatia reflected on her stardom and its impact on her personal life. The actor recently parted ways with Vijay Varma.

Salaar re-release: Why Prabhas's film deserves to be classic while fans await Part 2Prabhas and Prithviraj Sukumaran's Salaar: Part 1 - Ceasefire is gearing up for a re-release on March 21. Ahead of the re-release, let us revisit Salaar and why it deserves the cult-classic status.

Baida review: Good story, slow pace in Sourabh Raaj Jain's supernatural thrillerReleased-Fri Mar 21, 2025'Baida' is a supernatural thriller, but even with its decent performances, it falls short somewhere. The film stars Sudhanshu Rai, Hiten Tejwani, and Sourabh Raaj Jain, among others, in a story which has the potential to entertain.

general news.headline: Karnataka Minister claims 48 politicians, including central leaders, honey trappedKarnataka Minister KN Rajanna made an explosive claim in the Assembly about 48 politicians, including central leaders, being victims of honey traps. This triggered a political storm, with demands for a high-level investigation.

Meerut woman fed husband sedative, killed him, then went on vacation with loverIn Meerut, a woman and her lover sedated her husband, stabbed him to death, and sealed his body in a cement-filled drum. The duo then went on a vacation to Himachal Pradesh.

India submits bid to host 2030 Commonwealth Games: Sports Ministry SourcesIndia submitted the bid to host the 2030 Commonwealth Games on Thursday, March 20. It's a major step towards achieving India's dream of hosting the 2036 Summer Olympic Games in Ahmedabad.

Disha Salian's father seeks probe on Aaditya Thackeray, MLA says bid to defameDisha Salian, who was late actor Sushant Singh Rajput's former manager, was found dead in June 2020. The petition alleged that Disha was gang-raped and murdered.

IPL Story, Part 2: From power to ruin, the league that devoured its ownThe Indian Premier League, like the mysterious host in Agatha Christie's novel first published as Ten Little Niggers, invited many to its party, only to destroy them one by one.

100% salary hike for Chief Minister, legislators: Inside Karnataka draft billIndia Today has exclusively accessed the Karnataka Legislature Salaries, Pensions, and Allowances (Amendment) Bill, 2025, which proposes significant salary hikes for legislators, ministers, and Assembly officials.

People in war-torn Ukraine and Palestine are happier than Indians: ReportAre you happy? Do the people around you seem happy? While this question might invite deep reflection, the answer to personal happiness often boils down to a simple 'Yes' or 'No.' The 2025 World Happiness Report is out and Finland has topped the list. Check out India's ranking.

Bengaluru techie levels cash-for-intimacy charge, wife alleges domestic abuseA Bengaluru techie accused his wife of harassment over financial demands and physical abuse. His wife filed a counter-complaint alleging domestic violence and dowry harassment. The police summoned both for questioning to look into the matter.

Kanye West accuses Kim Kardashian of 'sex trafficking'Rapper Kanye West ranted against his ex-wife Kim Kardashian in a social media post. He called her a 'sex trafficker' and raised concerns over their daughter, North's music video.

X sues government for using IT Act to block content, says arbitrary censorshipElon Musk's X — earlier known as Twitter — has sued the Indian government for using the Information Technology Act to block tweets and other content on the platform. X says that the provision does not grant the government powers to block tweets.

Watch: Yuzvendra Chahal wears 'be your own sugar daddy' T-shirt to divorce hearingIndia cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal was seen wearing a T-shirt with a message that read 'be your own sugar daddy' during his divorce plea hearing at a family court in Mumbai on Thursday.

What happens when you cut out carbs? A nutrition coach's eye-opening experimentNutrition coach Justin Gichaba went on a zero-carb diet for seven days. Read on to see how it affected his body and why carbohydrates are essential for those with intense workout routines.

Armaan and I are one: Singer Amaal Mallik after deleting 'breaking family ties' postSinger Amaal Mallik talked about his struggle with clinical depression in a now-deleted social media post. He announced in the same post that he was breaking ties with his family. However, he later mentioned that his relationship with his brother, Armaan Malik, is fine.

April 6 match between KKR and LSG to shift from Kolkata to GuwahatiIPL 2025: The April 6 game between Kolkata Knight Riders and Lucknow Super Giants will be shifted from Kolkata to Guwahati. The decision was taken after Kolkata Police informed the state cricket body that it wouldn't be able to provide adequate security for the game, which coincides with Ram Navami festivities.

Why Taiwan standing up to China propaganda is a lesson for IndiaAs Chinese narratives in Indian public discourse raise concerns, Taiwan's crackdown on pro-China influencers underlines the need to proactively counter foreign agendas

'They want to kill me': UP man records video, found hanging at in-laws' placeOn the day of the incident, the man had gone to bring his wife back without informing his family. His father alleged that his son was threatened and forced into taking this extreme step.

How Sambhaji Maharaj's 9-year struggle doomed Aurangzeb and the Mughal empire's fallCrowned as the Chhatrapati of Marathas in 1681 after Shivaji's death, Sambhaji Maharaj did not merely inherit the throne, but the smouldering legacy of Swarajya. Sensing weakness, the Mughals kept doggedly pursuing him, and he was captured after nine years of resistance. Sambhaji endured 40 days of savage torture at the hands of Aurangzeb, but still, he would neither surrender nor convert.

Papa is in drum, Meerut man's daughter told neighbours after wife killed himThe five-year-old daughter of the Meerut woman, who killed her husband with her lover's help, reportedly told neighbours that her father was inside the drum. The claim was made by the mother of the victim, Saurabh Rajput.

Mounjaro, popular weight-loss drug, launched in India. Here's how much it costsPopular anti-diabetes and obesity drug Mounjaro, containing the active ingredient tirzepatide, is now available in India in a single-dose vial.
Stanley cups, sunscreen tubes… so we're bedazzling everything now?'What's a girl gonna do? A diamond's gotta shine'.

Grok under scrutiny over use of slang: Who bears the blame?AI chatbot Grok's responses to users in India have gone viral over its use of Hindi slang and unfiltered language. Who can be held liable for the answers generated by Grok and to what extent?

Devendra Fadnavis says strict MCOCA laws would be invoked against cow smugglersDevendra Fadnavis said that if someone is found repeatedly involved in cow smuggling, action will be taken against them under MCOCA.

As Rahul asks Congress to up its game in Gujarat, why Ahmed Patel is missedA key reason behind dissonance between the party's central and state leaderships is absence of the late Ahmed Patel, Sonia Gandhi's political advisor

Karnataka plans to introduce sex education classes 14 years after rejecting itKarnataka plans to introduce sex education for Classes 8-12, a move contrasting with past resistance from the state on this topic,  alongside moral education for younger students. India has also had a history of controversies whenever sex education is brought up.

Kendall Jenner criticizes Khloe Kardashian's 'cold' behavior towards Lamar OdomKendall Jenner criticized Khloe Kardashian's 'cold' and 'snarky' behavior during her reunion with Lamar Odom. She compared it to Khloe's treatment of Tristan Thompson and admitted she cried watching the episode.

His decision comes weeks after he found himself in the middle of a controversy involving podcaster Ranveer Allahabadia's comments on his YouTube show, 'India's Got Latent'.

sports.headline: Kirsty Coventry becomes 1st female president of Olympic body, Jay Shah leads wishesInternational Cricket Council (ICC) President Jay Shah congratulated the newly elected President of the International Olympic Committee Kirsty Coventry, who also became the first woman to hold the position.
NCAA Tournament: Fordham sacks Keith Urgo over recruiting violations chargesFordham parted ways with basketball coach Keith Urgo amid charges of recruiting violations.

Rangers seek rebound against high-flying maple leafsAfter a sluggish stretch, the New York Rangers aim to reignite their offense as they face the Toronto Maple Leafs, who bring firepower and momentum into a high-stakes Eastern Conference showdown.

NBA: Boston Celtics set for record-breaking $6.1 billion saleOn Thursday, reigning NBA champions, the Boston Celtics announced plans of a $6.1 billion sale to a private equity firm. If approved, this would be the most expensive team sale in North America.

NFL eyes Tush Push ban, playoff seeding revamp in proposed rule changesThe league is considering eliminating the controversial QB sneak tactic and adjusting playoff seeding criteria. Owners will vote on proposals that could reshape competitive balance and game strategy for the 2025 season.

PCB says no monetary loss in Champions Trophy, claims USD 10 million profitPakistan Cricket Board (PCB) has refuted claims of monetary loss after hosting the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 and said that it earned approximately USD 10 million as profit.

March Madness 2025: I'm cutting It close, says Barack Obama as he unveils annual bracketThe 2025 March Madness season has begun with fans choosing their favourites. Former U.S. President Barack Obama has revealed his picks for the NCAA Tournament.

India submits bid to host 2030 Commonwealth Games: Sports Ministry SourcesIndia submitted the bid to host the 2030 Commonwealth Games on Thursday, March 20. It's a major step towards achieving India's dream of hosting the 2036 Summer Olympic Games in Ahmedabad.

Injury-struck LSG hope for miracle from Rishabh Pant, Nicholas PooranLucknow Super Giants are set to usher in a new era under Rishabh Pant. But things could get very tricky for the squad due to the multiple deficiencies in the team.

Is Gary Payton playing tonight? NBA injury updates: Warriors vs RaptorsThe Golden State Warriors will face the Toronto Raptors in a regular NBA game on Thursday, March 20. The Warriors' injury report seems favourable as they prepare for an epic battle except Gary Payton II who is uncertain due to a knee injury.

NBA: Teyana Taylor accuses Iman Shumpert of leaking divorce detailsTeyana Taylor and Iman Shumpert finalised their divorce on June 27, 2024. However, Taylor has now taken legal action against Shumpert, accusing him of leaking sealed divorce documents to the media.

The Warriors' injury report seems favourable as they prepare for an epic battle except Gary Payton II who is uncertain due to a knee injury.

NBA: Teyana Taylor accuses Iman Shumpert of leaking divorce detailsTeyana Taylor and Iman Shumpert finalised their divorce on June 27, 2024. However, Taylor has now taken legal action against Shumpert, accusing him of leaking sealed divorce documents to the media.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
